title: Mobile Microlearning for Strengthening Management Leadership Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic business concepts and general understanding of work environments
context.additional_context: Enhanced interaction through strengthened teaching presence and application of project-based assessment in smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Learners analyze effective decision-making processes within organizations and achieve over 80% application proficiency in simulation tasks
Learners complete team project reports incorporating peer feedback using leadership communication strategies
Learners derive problem-solving frameworks through business case analysis and systematically organize them in digital portfolios

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
